content.title: The Artist Welfare Fund Of Assam
content.department: Department of Cultural Affairs, Govt. of Assam
content.details: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to artists who are in distress due to old age or other handicaps, including medical aid and educational support for their dependents.
benefits: Financial assistance for artists in distress
Medical aid for artists and their dependents
Educational support for up to two children of artists
Assistance in case of accidents or medical emergencies
eligibility: Artists must be above the age of 20 years
Applicants must provide artistic credentials supporting their achievements
content.application_process: Offline application in the standard application form available on the website, sent to the office of Assam State Film (Finance & Development) Corporation Ltd.
documents_required: Proof of Residence: Passport, Driving License, Electricity Bill, etc.
Proof of Age / DOB: Aadhaar Card, PAN Card, Birth Certificate, etc.
Recent Passport Sized Photograph (not older than six months)

faqs.question: Does the scheme extend to other Northeastern states of India?
faqs.answer: No, the 'The Artist Welfare Fund of Assam' extends only to the whole of Assam.

faqs.question: What is meant by 'Dependent' for the purpose of this scheme?
faqs.answer: 'Dependent' means and includes: Spouse of a deceased Artist; Minor sons and daughters; Unmarried and non-earning daughters; Parents wholly dependent on the Artist.

faqs.question: Are the artists who are in financial distress due to their old age also covered in this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the scheme helps the Artists (or their dependents) who are in financial distress due to old age or otherwise handicapped from accident or disease.

faqs.question: Is the education of the children of the artists also covered in this scheme?
faqs.answer: Yes, the education for such Artists and their dependents (to be limited up to two children) is covered in this scheme.

faqs.question: Can the passport sized photograph be older than one year?
faqs.answer: No, the Passport Sized Photograph should be recent (not older than six months), Clear, and Colored.

faqs.question: Is the grant of financial assistance from the Artist Welfare (Corpus) Fund of Assam to any artist a matter of right?
faqs.answer: No, the Grant of financial assistance from the Artist Welfare (Corpus) Fund of Assam to any Artist is NOT a matter of right.

faqs.question: How is an 'Artist' defined for the purpose of this scheme?
faqs.answer: An 'Artist' means a person who has made substantial contribution in the field of art and culture of the State, including cine artists, performing artists, visual artists, technicians, sculptors, craftsmen, puppeteers, etc.
